title: May the paths of your life…
---

May the paths of your life,<br>
Be planted,<br>
With seeds of goodness

 May they grow into trees,<br>
Of fond memories

 That shade your mind<br>
And keep you sane,<br>
When on days of despair<br>
You go on a walk<br>
Down that lane!
